fields.title: Name - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.title: Identifying number - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumCurrentYrCdt
fields.title: Line 1 -  General business credit from line 2 of all Parts III with box A checked

fields.name: txtPassiveActCdtsIncl
fields.title: Line 2 - Passive activity credits from line 2 of all Parts III with box B checked

fields.name: txtPassiveCdtAllowed
fields.title: Line 3 - Enter the applicable passive activity credits allowed for 2021

fields.name: txtCarryfwdToThisyr
fields.title: Line 4 - Carryforward of general business credit to 2021. Enter the amount from line 2 of Part III with box C checked

options.label: Check this box if the carryforward was changed or revised from the original reported amount

fields.name: txtCarrybckToNxtyr
fields.title: Line 5 - Carryback of general business credit from 2021. Enter the amount from line 2 of Part III with box D  checked

fields.name: txtCreditAmtIn3800
fields.title: Line 6  Add lines 1, 3 , 4 , and 5  -  This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtRegTaxBefCdt
fields.title: Line 7  Regular tax before credits: Individuals. Enter the sum of the amounts from Form 1040, 1040-SR, or 1040-NR, line 16, and Schedule 2 (Form 1040), line 2. Corporations. Enter the amount from Form 1120, Schedule J, Part I, line 2; or the applicable line of your return. Estates and trusts. Enter the sum of the amounts from Form 1041, Schedule G, lines 1a and 1b, plus any Form 8978 amount included on line 1d; or the amount from the applicable line of your return

fields.name: txtAlterMinTaxAmt
fields.title: Line 8 Alternative minimum tax: Individuals. Enter the amount from Form 6251, line 11. Corporations. Enter 0. Estates and trusts. Enter the amount from Schedule I (Form 1041), line 54

fields.name: txtAddRegtaxAmt
fields.title: Line 9  Add lines 7 and 8 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtFornTaxCdt
fields.title: Line 10a  Foreign tax credit -  This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdtsSumAmtFr1040
fields.title: Line 10b Certain allowable credits

fields.name: txtAllCdtSumAmt
fields.title: Line 10c Add lines 10a and 10b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtNettIncTaxAmt
fields.title: Line 11 Net income tax. Subtract line 10c from line 9. If zero, skip lines 12 through 15 and enter -0- on line 16 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtNettRegTaxAmt
fields.title: Line 12 Net regular tax. Subtract line 10c from line 7. If zero or less, enter 0 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtExcess25Per
fields.title: Line 13  Enter 25% (0. 25) of the excess, if any, of line 12 over $25, 000. See instructions

fields.name: txtTentMiniTax
fields.title: Line 14  Tentative minimum tax: Individuals. Enter the amount from Form 6251, line 9. Corporations. Enter 0. Estates and trusts. Enter the amount from Schedule I (Form 1041), line 52 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMaxTentExcess
fields.title: Line 15 Enter the greater of line 13 or line 14 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubNettaxMaxval
fields.title: Line 16 Subtract line 15 from line 11. If zero or less, enter 0 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMinCurrentNetrea
fields.title: Line 17 Enter the smaller of line 6 or line 16 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerSsn
fields.title: SSN - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMulTentMiniTax
fields.title: Line 18  Multiply line 14 by 75% (0. 75). See instructions

fields.name: txtMaxRegTentTax
fields.title: Line 19 Enter the greater of line 13 or line 18 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubNetMaxtenTax
fields.title: Line 20 Subtract line 19 from line 11. If zero or less, enter 0  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubNettaxTentax
fields.title: Line 21 Subtract line 17 from line 20. If zero or less, enter 0 -  This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumLn3Boxacd
fields.title: Line 22  Combine the amounts from line 3 of all Parts III with box A, C , or D checked

fields.name: txtSumLn3Boxb
fields.title: Line 23 Passive activity credit from line 3 of all Parts III with box B checked

fields.name: txtSumLn3BoxbAllowed
fields.title: Line 24 Enter the applicable passive activity credit allowed for 2021. See instructions

fields.name: txtCdtFrm8844
fields.title: Line 25 Add lines 22 and 24 -  This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtEmpzoneReneCdt
fields.title: Line 26 Empowerment zone and renewal community employment credit allowed. Enter the smaller of line 21 or line 25  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubNettaxExcess
fields.title: Line 27  Subtract line 13 from line 11. If zero or less, enter 0  -  This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtAddF8844Research
fields.title: Line 28  Add lines 17 and 26  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubNettaxF8844
fields.title: Line 29 Subtract line 28 from line 27. If zero or less, enter 0 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumLn5Boxa
fields.title: Line 30 Enter the general business credit from line 5 of all Parts III with box A checked

fields.name: txtSumLn5BoxbLn6Boxf
fields.title: Line 32  Passive activity credits from line 5 of all Parts III with box B checked

fields.name: txtLn5BoxbLn6BoxfAllowed

fields.title: Line 34  Carryforward of business credit to 2021. Enter the amount from line 5 of Part III with box C checked and line 6 of Part III with box G checked. See instructions for statement to attach  Check this box if the carryforward was changed or revised from the original reported amount

options.label: Check this box if the carryforward was changed or revised from the original reported amount

fields.name: txtLn5BoxdLn6Boxh
fields.title: Line 35 Carryback of business credit from 2022. Enter the amount from line 5 of Part III with box D checked

fields.title: Line 36 Add lines 30, 33, 34, and 35  - This field is automatically calculated for you
